name: muley
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of an animal such as a cow or a deer) without horns or antlers: I spotted a nice muley buck in amongst some trees on the hillside. I'm not going to sit around here chewing like an old muley cow.
More examplesFewer examplesShe noticed something hanging around the muley cow's neck.We sometimes see muley deer and mountain lions in this area.

a cow, deer, or other animal without horns or antlers: The wind carried their scent to the muley, which quickly moved away. Adult muleys are tough enough to survive the winter outdoors.
More examplesFewer examplesThey were out in the forest hunting muleys.Mountain muleys usually move to lower ground for the winter.
